name: underlying
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: underlying
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

example.eg: And what might be the underlying significance of these supposedly random acts?
example.egtrans: 这些看似偶然的行为，其暗含的意义可能是什么呢？

dsense.name: underlying
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: used to describe something on which something else is based

example.eg: The price of the investment fell below the value of the underlying assets.
example.egtrans: 这一投资项目的价格已经跌至低于标的资产价值。

dsense.name: underlying
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: positioned under the surface of something

example.eg: The currents are affected by the shape of the underlying rocks.
example.egtrans: 水流受水下岩石形状的影响。
